content.heading: Universal apps at your fingertips
content.subheading: Great app experiences across great devices are available right when you want it. Our most comprehensive platform ever is ready to help you do great things.

background-image.alt: A windows tablet showing an abundance of apps overflowing off the screen to the left.

content.heading: Uber
content.subheading: Find a driver in over 40 countries

background-image.alt: A determined woman exits a vehicle in the city

content.heading: Windows Apps
content.body: Enhance your Windows experience with a world of exciting apps. Get access to top titles and app recommendations just for you. With notifications and innovative design, Windows apps will help you do more.

featured-image.alt: A camera icon overlaid on a colorful collage background.
A picture of an Xbox avatar on a green background.

The Sway icon, featuring an image of a mountain and lines of text, overlaid on a teal background.
Soundcloud logo showing a cloud, with half of the cloud rendered as sound equalizer bars.
An illustrated icon depicting an avocado on a lime green background.
Photo Editor logo showing a swirling rainbow coming out of a camera lens.
The NFL logo on a gold background.
A red and white bag of popcorn, overlaid on a blue background.
A white heart with a human figure iside hearing sound waves, overlaid on a red background.

content.heading: Windows Phone Apps
content.body: All your favorite apps and some brand new titles are on Windows Phone. With instant notifications only on Windows phones, you get the info you want, right on your start screen.

image.alt: Windows Phone showing various screens of apps overlaid,such as Vine, Hulu Plus, Spotify and Slack.

content.heading: Xbox apps
content.body: Access all of your favorite apps anytime - free on Xbox. Get connected to popular apps on Xbox One, invluding all your favorites like Netflix, Hulu Plus, Twitch, Crackle, Amazon Instant Video, Machinima, and more.

image.alt: Several images showing the Xbox home screen, including the CW TV Now, FOXNOW, Machinima and Twitch.
